item.description: We are hoping to have a big crowd. I have booked the pampered chef to come to Pet Quarters as well as Bety. I will have things to sell from Green Mtn.. I will need people to help run the hug a pug for a dollar and to make goodies to sell... If you can help please let me know.... pug hugs Patty

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Green MTN Fund Raiser
